title: Lewis and Clark National Historical Park: Calendar
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Calendar            Calendar           Keyword       By Date     Start Date      End Date          Search         Upcoming Events    Showing 1 results    Show ALL instances of recurring events   RSS Feed      Lewis and Clark National Historical Park 100 Paddle for 100 Years      Location: Youngs Bay and Lewis & Clark River Fees: free     Thursday, August 25, 2016 Grab your life jacket and hop in your kayak, canoe (or other person-powered watercraft) and join park rangers on a paddle to celebrate the 100th anniversary of the National Park Service.
